World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 12 日星期五 16:12:02 GMT 120
US scientists say one-in-three chance 2024 another year of record heatThis year has a one-in-three chance of being even hotter than 2023, which was already the world's hottest on record, scientists from the U.S. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 16:04:13 GMT O56GRO7RGFOFZAC347KNLDMAHY https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/us-scientists-say-one-in-third-chance-2024-another-year-record-heat-2024-01-12/Gloria Dickie商业环境
Somali leader's son freed in fatal car accident trial in TurkeyA Turkish court scrapped an arrest warrant for the son of Somalia's president on Friday after he participated in a court case over a fatal car accident involving a diplomatic car he had been driving, state broadcaster TRT reported. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 15:47:13 GMT PXHN6CNCMJO23FUTBHEJHVD5DM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/somali-leaders-son-freed-fatal-car-accident-trial-turkey-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东
US issues sanctions targeting revenue supporting Houthi attacksThe U.S. on Friday issued sanctions targeting commodity shipments financing Iran's Quds Force and Yemen's Houthis as Washington stepped up pressure on the Iran-backed Houthis over attacks on international shipping. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 15:40:24 GMT SHI2AJOZAVOTZO6PV4Q5GUP32A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-issues-sanctions-targeting-revenue-supporting-houthi-attacks-2024-01-12/Daphne Psaledakis世界中东
Mexico delegation to visit Washington to continue migration talks, president saysA Mexican delegation will visit Washington later this month to continue migration talks, Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said on Friday in a regular press conference. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 15:38:35 GMT USOV6GVEGZK7FGZR6JBVJSHJ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-delegation-visit-washington-continue-migration-talks-president-says-2024-01-12/Reuters世界美洲
Exclusive: Ukraine needs more attack aircraft for war effort - ground forces commanderUkraine's ground forces commander said on Friday that Kyiv needed more military aircraft for its war effort, such as U.S. A-10 attack jets to support infantry and planes that could fire long-range cruise missiles. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 15:24:15 GMT ISN7YGBMPNPE7ENXMPDMHKQM5I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-needs-more-attack-aircraft-war-effort-ground-forces-commander-2024-01-12/Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Poland to change process for judges' nominations with eye on EU fundsPolish Justice Minister Adam Bodnar outlined on Friday a bill that aims to correct the way judges are appointed as a first step in rolling back the previous nationalist government's judicial reforms with a view to unfreezing EU funds. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 15:03:51 GMT JTE72O7YCROX3ERHBGGDME6MUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-change-process-judges-nominations-with-eye-eu-funds-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
For Palestinians, ICJ genocide case against Israel is 'test for humanity'Palestinians in the occupied West Bank welcomed the case brought by South Africa in the International Court of Justice accusing Israel of genocide, saying the proceedings were an opportunity to hold Israel to account for its military assault in Gaza. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 14:59:36 GMT 624J5GIRSRNKBJSM2TC57TEOVY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-icj-genocide-case-against-israel-is-test- humanity-2024-01-12/Henriette Chacar, Mohammad Torokman世界中东
Deforestation in Brazil's Amazon down by 50% to five-year low in 2023Deforestation in Brazil's Amazon rainforest in 2023 halved from the previous year to its lowest level since 2018, government data showed on Friday, a major win for President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva in his first year in office. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 14:52:26 GMT PP7RNLVE7NKW3AN2KRL44IOS24 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/deforestation-brazils-amazon-down-by-50- Five-year-low-2023-2024-01-12/Reuters世界美洲
Turkey providing documents for genocide hearings against Israel -ErdoganTurkey is providing documents for a case brought by South Africa against Israel at the U.N.'s top court on a charge of committing genocide against Palestinian civilians, President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 14:35:34 GMT 6MGYZCKWRFKSFHWZQZQF6T3XAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-providing-documents-genocide-hearings-against-israel-erdogan-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东
Ecuador's Noboa seeks tax hike to fund securityThe administration of Ecuadorean President Daniel Noboa has asked lawmakers to weigh an increase in value added tax (VAT) to finance efforts to combat crime gangs, as the armed forces increased operations in violent areas on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 14:31:41 GMT ZW5JSV2IPFPZVP2EJL54HAINVM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuadors-noboa-seeks-tax-hike-fund-security-2024-01-12/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
Yemen's enigmatic Houthi leader is fierce battlefield commanderAbdul Malik al-Houthi, enigmatic leader of Yemen's Houthi fighters whose attacks on Red Sea shipping have drawn fire from the U.S. and British militaries, created the defiant force challenging world powers from a ragtag militia in sandals. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 14:13:36 GMT PMDRN7R2NROM3MFKJ652KYTWOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthi-leader-whose-mountain-fighters-are-takeing-global-powers-2024-01-12/Michael Georgy, Aziz Yaakoubi世界中东
